title: Boston-Back Bay-Beacon Street-Fabulous Apt
posting_body: This is a one bedroom in the Best Area...
The Apartment has very nice Cabinets..
Recessed lighting...2 large windows in living room...
Bedroom is good size with plenty of closet space and 2 windows ...
Nice Residents in Brownstone....Heat & Hot Water are Included...
Walk to Shops at Newbury Street or the Charles River...
No Management Company, Just an Owner that Cares...No Fees...
Off street parking is available for additional fee.
